message.body: Hello again my friend
Guten Tag!
How was the con?
How are you on this fine day?
Oh its not until this weekend. Im looking forward to it tho :3
Where's the congoing to be?
Somerset, in jersey. Its animenext
Ahʔ!… UK then, yes?
of six for you. Is that correct?
That would sort of explain why our hours are out of sync. My "this evening" at my 8:00 pm is after midnight for you. And now it's ten of one for me, ten
D'ohhh, never mind. I just googled it & feel dumb.
Ahaha, its all good man. Ive just been really busy the past few days so i havent had much time to chat
Expect any free chat time today?
Im good for now but ill be busy later, gotta study for finals and all that. What are you up to on this fine day?
I'm at work, same as most weekdays. I get to do this 'cause I work where this is being collected, tho I'm not on that project.
Oh yea? Thats pretty cool actually. What do you do if you dont mind my asking?
tation. And now I'm putting together documentation, descriptions, specs, and so on w the data into a package we can release to researchers.
Right now other than this I'm preparing a corpus of Bengali with named entity annotation for publication. I don't know Bengali but I supervised the anno
Thats really cool. My boyfriend works at the hospital at penn, he writes programs for the radiation oncology department
At HUP?
Yessir
Is that in Perelman, basement or ground floor?
I spent quite a bit of time there from 2008-2011.
Anyhow, what are you studying?
You know im not sure tbh, i feel like its perelman but i could be wrong
Info technology, i want to work on network security when i graduate. Im also trying to minor in japanese
Gee, i've never heard of an anime fan being interested in Japanese! ;-)
Ahaha, its kinda funny, when i first started taking japanese i was the only caucasian in my class. I do enjoy it though. Its tough but i love the language
Oddly enough (not!), some of my friends are in info tech. One's just written a bk on data preservation, and another has been working on deduplication sw
; she just wrote me the other day about it bc the company has announced it so its no longer confidential
Oh yea? Thats really cool, wheres she working if you dont mind my asking?
I don't remember bit I can look it up. They don't sell it retail but to mfrs& suppliers. Hitachi is one.
To teach french to native japanese speakers
Language is probably my favourite thing to learn about. I love being able to communicate with people from around the world. My current life goal is to be able
My daughter is teaching in the JET Programme.
My friend works for Permabit. I tried to copy the URL of the announcement out of chat but couldn't. It's on infobits.com.
Oh, thats so cool! Im so jealous. How is she enjoying it?
(JET: Japanese English Teaching. English speakers as teaching assistants in J. schools)
Plenty. It's a 1yr contract w option to renew up to 5 max. She's finishing #4 now & will go back after visiting home this summer for #5.
he Consulate, bc that meant her chances of acceptance had gone up to 50%.
The pgm is run by the Natl & prefectural & local govts. It's very hard to get into so she was really chuffed when she was accepted for an interview at t
ing dtr spent 3yrs in a tiny tiny rural farming & fishing cmty 4hrs' drive from Nagoya!
Okay cool, thanks man :3
There are lots of for-profit teaching opportunities in Tk& the other big coyotes XXXX cities but JET sends them where they're needrd, so my big-city-lov
I better get back to that Bengali corpus now. Later maybe?
Un peu. But this project is collecting English text, so best no more French in these chats! Lay-tah!
Thats awesome. Have fun with your work, later man
